message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet you at $15,000. I would like to counteroffer at $14,000.
